basics.name: Marcos Klender Carrasco
basics.label: Software Engineer with +8 years of experience
basics.summary: Software Engineer with 8+ years of experience specializing in frontend development and design systems. I bridge the gap between design and engineering, building enterprise-grade, pixel-perfect responsive interfaces using React, TypeScript, and modern web technologies.  I'm passionate about crafting delightful user experiences, building robust design systems, and mentoring development teams. Currently seeking international opportunities to contribute to innovative AI-powered tools and startup environments where individual contributions have massive impact.
basics.ogDescription: Software Engineer with 8+ years building scalable React applications and design systems!

education.area: Master's Degree in Software Engineering and IT Systems

experience.name: Consejo Nacional Electoral
experience.summary: Led provincial IT department ensuring 99.9% uptime for critical electoral systems serving thousands of concurrent users during national elections. Delivered comprehensive technical training to 120+ employees, achieving 75% reduction in software misuse incidents. Provided remote support to 200+ election workers, reducing software-related issues by 80% during high-stakes electoral periods. Mentored junior developers and established React development best practices across government systems.

experience.name: iLinser
experience.summary: Co-founded and led frontend architecture for web development company, establishing coding standards and development workflows. Built reusable UI component libraries and design systems ensuring consistent branding and pixel-perfect implementation across multiple projects. Delivered responsive websites and e-commerce platforms that increased client sales by up to 90% through improved UX and mobile optimization. Implemented performance strategies resulting in 50% improvement in user retention.
